attributes.action: Call a referendum to rejoin the European Union
attributes.additional_details: The rising tensions sprouting from the US, involving Denmark (Greenland), and the USA. Another reason is due to the regulations on food, trade, and travel, we are subject to lesser restrictions on our food products, after we left the EU, there needs to be change. Brexit has caused nothing but issues.
attributes.background: Call a referendum to rejoin the EU, if all else fails, then bring in more regulations on the food we eat, and the quality of our products. We also need to rejoin our European allies, as we have become to estranged, with rising tensions in the world

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Hold a referendum on re-joining the European Union
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700041
